Weather Box

A physical weather machine that forecasts outside weather into a small tiny box. Build using ESP8266 has capability to work from IOT.

Deekshi

This project connects public transport buses to people to book thier tickets and seats online. This uses GPS to track the loction and show realtime travelling.
